name: Frogger (itch) (Argoneon1810)
description:
Frogger is a short escape game which you are being a  little frog who lost its way and finding way to home

With simple WASD control, you are asked to move this frog. You will have to cross highways,  and you will have to cross a river.

If you find the game too difficult or to easy, or if you are not happy with sound volume, visit 'settings', you will find what you seek.

Enjoy
